attrs.script:
vm_name = "@@{vm_name}@@"

# API Calls to get VM Info from Factori
url = "https://factori.itc.integra.fr/itService/getInfo/"+ vm_name +"?deployment_infos=true"
headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Accept': 'application/json'}
payload = {}
factori_user = "@@{creds_factori_api.username}@@"
factori_pass = "@@{creds_factori_api.secret}@@"
vm_domain = "@@{vm_domain}@@"
resp = urlreq(url, verb='GET', auth='BASIC', user=factori_user, passwd=factori_pass, headers=headers, verify=False)

json_resp=json.loads(resp.text)
print json_resp


# Admin Interface
vm_admin_interface = json_resp['adminInterface'][vm_name+".itc."+vm_domain]
print "vm_admin_ip = {0}".format(vm_admin_interface["ip_addr"])
print "vm_admin_netmask = {0}".format(vm_admin_interface["subnet_mask"])
print "vm_admin_gateway = {0}".format(vm_admin_interface["gateway"])


# Prod Interface
vm_prod_interface = json_resp['adminInterface'][vm_name+".prod."+vm_domain]
print "vm_prod_ip = {0}" .format(vm_prod_interface["ip_addr"])
print "vm_prod_netmask = {0}" .format(vm_prod_interface["subnet_mask"])
print "vm_prod_gateway = {0}" .format(vm_prod_interface["gateway"])

# BKE Interface
vm_bke_interface = json_resp['adminInterface'][vm_name+".bke."+vm_domain]
print "vm_bke_ip = {0}" .format(vm_bke_interface["ip_addr"])
print "vm_bke_netmask = {0}" .format(vm_bke_interface["subnet_mask"])
print "vm_bke_gateway = {0}" .format(vm_bke_interface["gateway"])
attrs.eval_variables: vm_admin_ip vm_admin_netmask vm_admin_gateway vm_prod_ip vm_prod_netmask vm_prod_gateway vm_bke_ip vm_bke_netmask vm_bke_gateway

cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
hostname: @@{vm_name}@@
fqdn: @@{vm_name}@@.@@{vm_domain}@@
users:
  - name: @@{vm_creds.username}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
chpasswd:
  list: |
    @@{vm_creds.username}@@:@@{vm_creds.secret}@@
  expire: False
ssh_pwauth:   true
write_files:
  - content: |
      DEVICE=eth0
      TYPE=Ethernet
      NM_CONTROLLED=no
      ONBOOT=yes
      BOOTPROTO=static
      IPADDR=@@{vm_admin_ip}@@
      NETMASK=@@{vm_admin_netmask}@@
      GATEWAY=@@{vm_admin_gateway}@@
    path: /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-eth0
  - content: |
      DEVICE=eth1
      TYPE=Ethernet
      NM_CONTROLLED=no
      ONBOOT=yes
      BOOTPROTO=static
      IPADDR=@@{vm_prod_ip}@@
      NETMASK=@@{vm_prod_netmask}@@
      GATEWAY=@@{vm_prod_gateway}@@
    path: /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-eth1
  - content: |
      DEVICE=eth2
      TYPE=Ethernet
      NM_CONTROLLED=no
      ONBOOT=yes
      BOOTPROTO=static
      IPADDR=@@{vm_bke_ip}@@
      NETMASK=@@{vm_bke_netmask}@@
      GATEWAY=@@{vm_bke_gateway}@@
    path: /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-eth2
runcmd:
  - [ifdown, eth0]
  - [ifup, eth0]
  - [ifdown, eth1]
  - [ifup, eth1]
  - [ifdown, eth2]
  - [ifup, eth2]

attrs.script:
vm_name = "@@{vm_name}@@"

# API Calls to get VM Info from Factori
url = "https://factori.itc.integra.fr/itService/getInfo/"+ vm_name +"?deployment_infos=true"
headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Accept': 'application/json'}
payload = {}
factori_user = "@@{creds_factori_api.username}@@"
factori_pass = "@@{creds_factori_api.secret}@@"
vm_domain = "@@{vm_domain}@@"
resp = urlreq(url, verb='GET', auth='BASIC', user=factori_user, passwd=factori_pass, headers=headers, verify=False)

json_resp=json.loads(resp.text)
print json_resp


# Admin Interface
vm_admin_interface = json_resp['adminInterface'][vm_name+".itc."+vm_domain]
print "vm_admin_ip = {0}".format(vm_admin_interface["ip_addr"])
print "vm_admin_netmask = {0}".format(vm_admin_interface["subnet_mask"])
print "vm_admin_gateway = {0}".format(vm_admin_interface["gateway"])


# Prod Interface
vm_prod_interface = json_resp['adminInterface'][vm_name+".prod."+vm_domain]
print "vm_prod_ip = {0}" .format(vm_prod_interface["ip_addr"])
print "vm_prod_netmask = {0}" .format(vm_prod_interface["subnet_mask"])
print "vm_prod_gateway = {0}" .format(vm_prod_interface["gateway"])

# BKE Interface
vm_bke_interface = json_resp['adminInterface'][vm_name+".bke."+vm_domain]
print "vm_bke_ip = {0}" .format(vm_bke_interface["ip_addr"])
print "vm_bke_netmask = {0}" .format(vm_bke_interface["subnet_mask"])
print "vm_bke_gateway = {0}" .format(vm_bke_interface["gateway"])
attrs.eval_variables: vm_admin_ip vm_admin_netmask vm_admin_gateway vm_prod_ip vm_prod_netmask vm_prod_gateway vm_bke_ip vm_bke_netmask vm_bke_gateway

cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
hostname: @@{vm_name}@@
fqdn: @@{vm_name}@@.@@{vm_domain}@@
users:
  - name: @@{vm_creds.username}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
chpasswd:
  list: |
    @@{vm_creds.username}@@:@@{vm_creds.secret}@@
  expire: False
ssh_pwauth:   true
write_files:
  - content: |
      DEVICE=eth0
      TYPE=Ethernet
      NM_CONTROLLED=no
      ONBOOT=yes
      BOOTPROTO=static
      IPADDR=@@{vm_admin_ip}@@
      NETMASK=@@{vm_admin_netmask}@@
      GATEWAY=@@{vm_admin_gateway}@@
    path: /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-eth0
  - content: |
      DEVICE=eth1
      TYPE=Ethernet
      NM_CONTROLLED=no
      ONBOOT=yes
      BOOTPROTO=static
      IPADDR=@@{vm_prod_ip}@@
      NETMASK=@@{vm_prod_netmask}@@
      GATEWAY=@@{vm_prod_gateway}@@
    path: /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-eth1
  - content: |
      DEVICE=eth2
      TYPE=Ethernet
      NM_CONTROLLED=no
      ONBOOT=yes
      BOOTPROTO=static
      IPADDR=@@{vm_bke_ip}@@
      NETMASK=@@{vm_bke_netmask}@@
      GATEWAY=@@{vm_bke_gateway}@@
    path: /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-eth2
runcmd:
  - [ifdown, eth0]
  - [ifup, eth0]
  - [ifdown, eth1]
  - [ifup, eth1]
  - [ifdown, eth2]
  - [ifup, eth2]
